00041 CdcLayerSD::CdcLayerSD(G4String name, MyVGeometryParameter* pointer)
00042 :MySD(name, pointer), hitsCollection(0)
00043 {
00044   m_GeometryParameter= dynamic_cast<SimpleGeometryParameter*> (pointer);
00045   if (!m_GeometryParameter){
00046                 std::cout<<"In CdcLayerSD::CdcLayerSD, cannot get SimpleGeometryParameter pointer!!!"<<std::endl;
00047     G4Exception("CdcLayerSD::CdcLayerSD()",
00048         "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00049         "cannot get SimpleGeometryParameter pointer");
00050   }
00051 }

00053 CdcLayerSD::~CdcLayerSD(){
00054 }

00056 //-----------------------------------Initialize----------------------------------------------
00057 //Will be called by geant4 automatically at the beginning of each event
00058 void CdcLayerSD::Initialize(G4HCofThisEvent* HCE)
00059 {
00060         hitsCollection = new CdcLayerHitsCollection
00061                 (SensitiveDetectorName,collectionName[0]);
00062 //      std::cout<<"====>In CdcLayerSD::Initialize(), created hitsCollection at ("<<(void*)hitsCollection<<std::endl;
00063         G4int HCID = -1;
00064         HCID = G4SDManager::GetSDMpointer()->GetCollectionID(collectionName[0]);
00065         if ( HCID < 0 ){
00066                 G4Exception("CdcLayerSD::Initialize()",
00067                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00068                                 "Cann not find hitsCollection of this event");
00069         }
00070         HCE->AddHitsCollection( HCID, hitsCollection );
00071   //initialize for root objects
00072   nHits = 0;
00073   m_x.clear();
00074   m_y.clear();
00075   m_z.clear();
00076   m_t.clear();
00077   m_px.clear();
00078   m_py.clear();
00079   m_pz.clear();
00080   m_e.clear();
00081   m_edep.clear();
00082   m_volID.clear();
00083   m_volName.clear();
00084   m_tid.clear();
00085   m_pid.clear();
00086   m_charge.clear();
00087   m_trackID.clear();
00088   m_trackLooping.clear();
00089 }

00091 //-----------------------------------SetBranch----------------------------------------------
00092 //Should be called at the beginning of each run (now in MyAnalysisSvc::BeginOfRunAction())
00093 void CdcLayerSD::SetBranch(){
00094         MyRoot* myRoot = MyRoot::GetMyRoot();
00095         G4String volName = get_VolName();
00096   if( flag_nHits ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_nHits", &nHits);
00097   if( flag_x ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_x", &m_x);
00098   if( flag_y ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_y", &m_y);
00099   if( flag_z ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_z", &m_z);
00100   if( flag_t ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_t", &m_t);
00101   if( flag_px ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_px", &m_px);
00102   if( flag_py ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_py", &m_py);
00103   if( flag_pz ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pz", &m_pz);
00104   if( flag_e ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_e", &m_e);
00105   if( flag_edep ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_edep", &m_edep);
00106   if( flag_volID ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_volID", &m_volID);
00107   if( flag_volName ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_volName", &m_volName);
00108   if( flag_tid ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_tid", &m_tid);
00109   if( flag_pid ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pid", &m_pid);
00110   if( flag_charge ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_charge", &m_charge);
00111 }

00113 //-----------------------------------ReadOutputCard----------------------------------------------
00114 //Should be called before the begin of each run (now in the constructor of MyAnalysisSvc)
00115 void CdcLayerSD::ReadOutputCard(G4String filename){
00116         ReSet();
00117         std::ifstream fin_card(filename);
00118         if(!fin_card){
00119                 std::cout<<"In CdcLayerSD::ReadOutputCard, cannot open "<<filename<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00120     G4Exception("CdcLayerSD::ReadOutputCard()",
00121         "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00122         "cannot find output card");
00123         }
00124         std::stringstream buf_card;
00125         G4String s_card;
00126         G4String volName = get_VolName();
00127         int n_output_section_symbol = 0;
00128         int n_filter_section_symbol = 0;
00129         G4String BRANCHSECTIONNAME = volName + "_SECTION";
00130         G4String FILTERSECTIONNAME = volName + "_FILTERSECTION";
00131         while(getline(fin_card,s_card)){
00132                 buf_card.str("");
00133                 buf_card.clear();
00134                 buf_card<<s_card;
00135 
00136                 //eleminate useless lines
00137     const char* c_card = s_card.c_str();
00138     int length = strlen(c_card);
00139     int offset = 0;
00140     for ( ; offset < length; offset++ ){
00141       if ( c_card[offset] != ' ' ) break;
00142     }
00143     if ( c_card[offset] == '#' || (c_card[offset] == '/' && c_card[offset+1] == '/') || length - offset == 0 ){
00144         continue;
00145     }
00146 
00147                 G4String name, unit;
00148                 buf_card>>name;
00149                 if ( n_output_section_symbol == 0 ){
00150                         if ( name == BRANCHSECTIONNAME ){
00151                                 n_output_section_symbol++;
00152                         }
00153                 }
00154                 else if ( n_output_section_symbol == 1 ){
00155                         if ( name == BRANCHSECTIONNAME ){
00156                                 n_output_section_symbol++;
00157                         }
00158                         else if( name == "nHits" ) {flag_nHits = true;}
00159                         else if( name == "x" ) {{flag_x = true; buf_card>>unitName_x; unit_x = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_x);}}
00160                         else if( name == "y" ) {{flag_y = true; buf_card>>unitName_y; unit_y = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_y);}}
00161                         else if( name == "z" ) {{flag_z = true; buf_card>>unitName_z; unit_z = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_z);}}
00162                         else if( name == "t" ) {{flag_t = true; buf_card>>unitName_t; unit_t = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_t);}}
00163                         else if( name == "px" ) {{flag_px = true; buf_card>>unitName_px; unit_px = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_px);}}
00164                         else if( name == "py" ) {{flag_py = true; buf_card>>unitName_py; unit_py = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_py);}}
00165                         else if( name == "pz" ) {{flag_pz = true; buf_card>>unitName_pz; unit_pz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pz);}}
00166                         else if( name == "e" ) {{flag_e = true; buf_card>>unitName_e; unit_e = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_e);}}
00167                         else if( name == "edep" ) {{flag_edep = true; buf_card>>unitName_edep; unit_edep = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_edep);}}
00168                         else if( name == "volID" ) {flag_volID = true;}
00169                         else if( name == "volName" ) {flag_volName = true;}
00170                         else if( name == "tid" ) {flag_tid = true;}
00171                         else if( name == "pid" ) {flag_pid = true;}
00172                         else if( name == "charge" ) {flag_charge = true;}
00173                         else{
00174                           std::cout<<"In CdcLayerSD::ReadOutputCard, unknown name: "<<name<<" in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00175                                 std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00176                         }
00177                 }
00178 
00179                 if ( n_filter_section_symbol == 0 ){
00180                         if ( name == FILTERSECTIONNAME ){
00181                                 n_filter_section_symbol++;
00182                         }
00183                 }
00184                 else if ( n_filter_section_symbol == 1 ){
00185                         if ( name == FILTERSECTIONNAME ){
00186                                 n_filter_section_symbol++;
00187                         }
00188                         else if( name == "Switch" ) Switch = true;
00189                         else if( name == "neutralCut" ) neutralCut = true;
00190                         else if( name == "FirstLoop" ) FirstLoop = true;
00191                         else if( name == "maxn" ) buf_card>>maxn;
00192                         else{
00193                                 G4double para;
00194                                 G4String unit;
00195                                 buf_card>>para>>unit;
00196                                 para *= MyString2Anything::get_U(unit);
00197                                 if( name == "minp" ) minp = para;
00198                                 else if ( name == "minedep" ) minedep = para;
00199                                 else if( name == "mint" ) mint = para;
00200                                 else if( name == "maxt" ) maxt = para;
00201                                 else if( name == "tres" ) tres = para;
00202                                 else{
00203                                         std::cout<<"In CdcLayerSD::ReadOutputCard, unknown name: "<<name<<" in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00204                                         std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00205                                 }
00206                         }
00207                 }
00208 
00209                 if ( n_output_section_symbol > 1 && n_filter_section_symbol > 1 ){
00210                         break;
00211                 }
00212         }
00213         buf_card.str("");
00214         buf_card.clear();
00215         if ( n_output_section_symbol <= 1 ){
00216           std::cout<<"*****************WARNING********************"<<std::endl;
00217                 std::cout<<"In CdcLayerSD::ReadOutputCard, failed to find enough section seperators \""<<BRANCHSECTIONNAME<<"\" for output in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00218                 std::cout<<"Will use default settings."<<std::endl;
00219                 std::cout<<"********************************************"<<std::endl;
00220         }
00221         if ( n_filter_section_symbol<= 1 ){
00222           std::cout<<"*****************WARNING********************"<<std::endl;
00223                 std::cout<<"In CdcLayerSD::ReadOutputCard, failed to find enough section seperators \""<<FILTERSECTIONNAME<<"\" for filter in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00224                 std::cout<<"Will use default settings."<<std::endl;
00225                 std::cout<<"********************************************"<<std::endl;
00226         }
00227         fin_card.close();
00228         ShowOutCard();
00229 }

00231 //-----------------------------------ReSet----------------------------------------------
00232 //Private
00233 void CdcLayerSD::ReSet(){
00234   //default output set
00235   flag_nHits = false;
00236   flag_x = false;
00237   flag_y = false;
00238   flag_z = false;
00239   flag_t = false;
00240   flag_px = false;
00241   flag_py = false;
00242   flag_pz = false;
00243   flag_e = false;
00244   flag_edep = false;
00245   flag_volID = false;
00246   flag_volName = false;
00247   flag_tid = false;
00248   flag_pid = false;
00249   flag_charge = false;
00250   //for fileter
00251   Switch = false;
00252   neutralCut = false;
00253   FirstLoop = false;
00254   minp = 0;
00255   maxn = 0;
00256   mint = 0;
00257   maxt = 0;
00258   tres = 0;
00259   minedep = -1*MeV;
00260 }

00262 //-----------------------------------ShowOutCard----------------------------------------------

00264 void CdcLayerSD::ShowOutCard(){
00265         std::cout<<"*************************Output settings for "<<get_VolName()<<"***************************"<<std::endl;
00266   //default output set
00267   std::cout<<"output nHits?   "<<(flag_nHits?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00268   std::cout<<"output x?       "<<(flag_x?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_x<<std::endl;
00269   std::cout<<"output y?       "<<(flag_y?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_y<<std::endl;
00270   std::cout<<"output z?       "<<(flag_z?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_z<<std::endl;
00271   std::cout<<"output t?       "<<(flag_t?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_t<<std::endl;
00272   std::cout<<"output px?      "<<(flag_px?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_px<<std::endl;
00273   std::cout<<"output py?      "<<(flag_py?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_py<<std::endl;
00274   std::cout<<"output pz?      "<<(flag_pz?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_pz<<std::endl;
00275   std::cout<<"output e?       "<<(flag_e?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_e<<std::endl;
00276   std::cout<<"output edep?    "<<(flag_edep?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_edep<<std::endl;
00277   std::cout<<"output volID?   "<<(flag_volID?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00278   std::cout<<"output volName? "<<(flag_volName?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00279   std::cout<<"output tid?     "<<(flag_tid?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00280   std::cout<<"output pid?     "<<(flag_pid?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00281   std::cout<<"output charge?  "<<(flag_charge?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00282   //for fileter
00283   std::cout<<"Switch on?      "<<(Switch?"yes":"no")<<std::endl;
00284   std::cout<<"neutralCut on?  "<<(neutralCut?"yes":"no")<<std::endl;
00285   std::cout<<"FirstLoop on?   "<<(FirstLoop?"yes":"no")<<std::endl;
00286   std::cout<<"minp =          "<<minp/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
00287   std::cout<<"maxn =          "<<maxn<<std::endl;
00288   std::cout<<"mint =          "<<mint/ns<<"ns"<<std::endl;
00289   std::cout<<"maxt =          "<<maxt/ns<<"ns"<<std::endl;
00290   std::cout<<"tres =          "<<tres/ns<<"ns"<<std::endl;
00291   std::cout<<"minedep =       "<<minedep/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
00292         std::cout<<"******************************************************************************"<<std::endl;
00293 }
00294 
00295 //-----------------------------------ProcessHits----------------------------------------------
00296 //Will be called by geant4 automatically everytime a step in CdcLayerSD generated
00297 G4bool CdcLayerSD::ProcessHits(G4Step* aStep,G4TouchableHistory* touchableHistory)
00298 {
00299 
00300 //*************************get useful variables***********************
00301 
00302         // get track info
00303   G4Track* gTrack = aStep->GetTrack() ;
00304   G4int trackID= gTrack->GetTrackID(); //G4 track ID of current track.
00305   G4int charge = gTrack->GetDefinition()->GetPDGCharge();
00306   G4int pid = gTrack->GetDefinition()->GetPDGEncoding();
00307 
00308   // get information at the beginning and at the end of step
00309   G4StepPoint* prePoint  = aStep->GetPreStepPoint() ;
00310   G4StepPoint* postPoint = aStep->GetPostStepPoint() ;
00311   G4ThreeVector pointIn_pos = prePoint->GetPosition();
00312   G4ThreeVector pointOut_pos = postPoint->GetPosition();
00313 
00314         // get volume info
00315   const G4VTouchable *touchable = prePoint->GetTouchable();
00316   G4int ReplicaNo = touchable->GetVolume(0)->GetCopyNo();
00317         G4String VolName = touchable->GetVolume(0)->GetName();
00318         int VolId = m_GeometryParameter->get_VolIndex(VolName);
00319         int TubsId = m_GeometryParameter->get_SolidIndex(VolId);
00320         double RMax = m_GeometryParameter->get_Tubs_RMax(TubsId,ReplicaNo);
00321         double RMin = m_GeometryParameter->get_Tubs_RMin(TubsId,ReplicaNo);
00322         int nLayers = m_GeometryParameter->get_RepNo(VolId);
00323         //std::cout<<"ReplicaNo = "<<ReplicaNo<<", RMax = "<<RMax<<", RMin = "<<RMin<<", nLayers = "<<nLayers<<std::endl;
00324 
00325   // get step info
00326   G4double edep = aStep->GetTotalEnergyDeposit();
00327 
00328         //on surface?
00329         G4double RIn = pointIn_pos.rho();
00330         G4double ROut = pointOut_pos.rho();
00331         G4double torlarance = 1e-5;
00332         bool prePoint_OnSurf = false;
00333         if ( prePoint->GetStepStatus() == fGeomBoundary && (RIn - RMin)/mm < torlarance ) prePoint_OnSurf = true;
00334         bool postPoint_OnSurf = false;
00335         if ( postPoint->GetStepStatus() == fGeomBoundary && (ROut - RMin)/mm < torlarance ) postPoint_OnSurf = true;
00336         G4ThreeVector hitPoint_pos, hitPoint2_pos;
00337         G4ThreeVector hitPoint_mom, hitPoint2_mom;
00338         G4double hitPoint_time, hitPoint2_time;
00339         G4double total_e, total_e2;
00340 
00341         //from inside? 
00342         bool FromInSide = (RIn < ROut);
00343 
00344         //occurred once? get track index
00345         bool occurredOnce = true;
00346         G4int track_index = -1;
00347         for ( int i = 0; i < m_trackID.size(); i++ ){//Has this track left something before?
00348                 if ( m_trackID[i] == trackID ){
00349                         track_index = i;
00350                         break;
00351                 }
00352         }
00353         if ( track_index == -1 ) occurredOnce = false;
00354 
00355 //*************************filter***********************
00356         //switch
00357         if (!Switch) return false;
00358 
00359         //maxn
00360         if ( maxn && nHits >= maxn ) return false;
00361 
00362         //once traveled outside? if yes, set looping
00363         if ( ReplicaNo == nLayers - 1 ){
00364                 if ( !FromInSide && prePoint_OnSurf && occurredOnce ){
00365                 //std::cout<<"Traveled outside once! Considered as looping!"<<std::endl;
00366                         m_trackLooping[track_index] = true;
00367                         return false;
00368                 }
00369         //std::cout<<"Outer most layer! not traveled out yet!"<<std::endl;
00370         }
00371         else if( ReplicaNo == 0 ){
00372                 if ( FromInSide && prePoint_OnSurf && occurredOnce ){
00373                 //std::cout<<"Traveled outside once! Considered as looping!"<<std::endl;
00374                         m_trackLooping[track_index] = true;
00375                         return false;
00376                 }
00377         //std::cout<<"Inner most layer! not traveled out yet!"<<std::endl;
00378         }
00379 
00380         //at inner boundary? if yes, record. if no, return
00381         if ( FromInSide ){
00382                 if ( !prePoint_OnSurf ) return false;
00383                 hitPoint_pos = pointIn_pos;
00384                 total_e = prePoint->GetTotalEnergy();
00385                 hitPoint_mom = prePoint->GetMomentum();
00386                 hitPoint_time = prePoint->GetGlobalTime();
00387 
00388                 hitPoint2_pos = pointOut_pos;
00389                 total_e2 = postPoint->GetTotalEnergy();
00390                 hitPoint2_mom = postPoint->GetMomentum();
00391                 hitPoint2_time = postPoint->GetGlobalTime();
00392         }
00393         else{
00394                 if ( !postPoint_OnSurf ) return false;
00395                 hitPoint_pos = pointOut_pos;
00396                 total_e = postPoint->GetTotalEnergy();
00397                 hitPoint_mom = postPoint->GetMomentum();
00398                 hitPoint_time = postPoint->GetGlobalTime();
00399 
00400                 hitPoint2_pos = pointIn_pos;
00401                 total_e2 = prePoint->GetTotalEnergy();
00402                 hitPoint2_mom = prePoint->GetMomentum();
00403                 hitPoint2_time = prePoint->GetGlobalTime();
00404         }
00405 
00406   //minp
00407         G4double hitPoint_pa = hitPoint_mom.mag();
00408         if ( minp && hitPoint_pa < minp ) return false;
00409 
00410         //time_window
00411   if(isnan(hitPoint_time)){
00412     G4cout<<"CdcLayerSD:error, hitPoint_time is nan "<<G4endl;
00413     return false;
00414   }
00415   if ( hitPoint_time < mint && mint ) return false;
00416   if ( hitPoint_time > maxt && maxt ) return false;
00417 
00418   //neutralCut
00419   if ( charge == 0 && neutralCut ) return false;
00420 
00421         //minedep
00422   if( edep <= minedep ) return false;
00423 
00424         //looping?
00425         if ( FirstLoop ){
00426                 //std::cout<<"**************checking looping*****************"<<std::endl;
00427                 //std::cout<<"tid = "<<trackID<<", vol = "<<VolName<<", rep = "<<ReplicaNo<<std::endl;
00428                 if (!occurredOnce){//New track.
00429                         //std::cout<<"New track!"<<std::endl;
00430                         m_trackID.push_back(trackID);
00431                         m_trackLooping.push_back(false);
00432                         track_index = m_trackID.size() - 1;
00433                 }
00434                 else{//old track.
00435                         if (m_trackLooping[track_index]){//looping already
00436                         //std::cout<<"Looping.."<<std::endl;
00437                                 return false;
00438                         }
00439                         int count = 1;
00440                         for ( int i = 0; i < nHits; i++ ){
00441                         //std::cout<<"vol["<<i<<"] = "<<m_volName[i]<<", rep["<<i<<"] = "<<m_volID[i]<<", tid["<<i<<"] = "<<m_tid[i]<<std::endl;
00442                                 if ( m_volName[i] == VolName && m_volID[i] == ReplicaNo && m_tid[i] == trackID ){
00443                                         count++;
00444                                 }
00445                                 //std::cout<<"occurred "<<count<<" times"<<std::endl;
00446                         }
00447                         if ( count >= 3 ){//3rd time hitting this volume, must be looping
00448                         //std::cout<<"Loop!!!"<<std::endl;
00449                                 m_trackLooping[track_index] = true;
00450                                 return false;
00451                         }
00452                 }
00453                 //std::cout<<"Not looping"<<std::endl;
00454         }
00455 
00456 //*********************generate new hit*************************************
00457 
00458         CdcLayerHit* newHit = new CdcLayerHit();
00459         newHit->SetTrackID(trackID);
00460         newHit->SetVolID(ReplicaNo);
00461         newHit->SetEdep(edep);
00462         newHit->SetPos(hitPoint_pos);
00463         newHit->SetGlobalT(hitPoint_time);
00464         hitsCollection->insert(newHit);
00465         //Set for root objects
00466         if(flag_x) m_x.push_back(hitPoint_pos.x()/unit_x);
00467         if(flag_y) m_y.push_back(hitPoint_pos.y()/unit_y);
00468         if(flag_z) m_z.push_back(hitPoint_pos.z()/unit_z);
00469         m_t.push_back(hitPoint_time/unit_t);
00470         if(flag_px) m_px.push_back(hitPoint_mom.x()/unit_px);
00471         if(flag_py) m_py.push_back(hitPoint_mom.y()/unit_py);
00472         if(flag_pz) m_pz.push_back(hitPoint_mom.z()/unit_pz);
00473         if(flag_e) m_e.push_back(total_e/unit_e);
00474         if(flag_edep) m_edep.push_back(edep/unit_edep);
00475         m_volID.push_back(ReplicaNo);
00476         m_volName.push_back(VolName);
00477         if(flag_tid) m_tid.push_back(trackID);
00478         if(flag_pid) m_pid.push_back(pid);
00479         if(flag_charge) m_charge.push_back(charge);
00480         nHits++;
00481 
00482         // prestep point and poststep point on the same layer?
00483         double gap = RMax - RMin;
00484         if ( fabs( RIn - ROut ) < gap/2 && prePoint_OnSurf && postPoint_OnSurf ){
00485                 CdcLayerHit* newHit = new CdcLayerHit();
00486                 newHit->SetTrackID(trackID);
00487                 newHit->SetVolID(ReplicaNo);
00488                 newHit->SetEdep(edep);
00489                 newHit->SetPos(hitPoint2_pos);
00490                 newHit->SetGlobalT(hitPoint2_time);
00491                 hitsCollection->insert(newHit);
00492                 //Set for root objects
00493                 if(flag_x) m_x.push_back(hitPoint2_pos.x()/unit_x);
00494                 if(flag_y) m_y.push_back(hitPoint2_pos.y()/unit_y);
00495                 if(flag_z) m_z.push_back(hitPoint2_pos.z()/unit_z);
00496                 if(flag_t) m_t.push_back(hitPoint2_time/unit_t);
00497                 if(flag_px) m_px.push_back(hitPoint2_mom.x()/unit_px);
00498                 if(flag_py) m_py.push_back(hitPoint2_mom.y()/unit_py);
00499                 if(flag_pz) m_pz.push_back(hitPoint2_mom.z()/unit_pz);
00500                 if(flag_e) m_e.push_back(total_e2/unit_e);
00501                 if(flag_edep) m_edep.push_back(edep/unit_edep);
00502                 if(flag_volID) m_volID.push_back(ReplicaNo);
00503                 if(flag_volName) m_volName.push_back(VolName);
00504                 if(flag_tid) m_tid.push_back(trackID);
00505                 if(flag_pid) m_pid.push_back(pid);
00506                 if(flag_charge) m_charge.push_back(charge);
00507                 nHits++;
00508         }
00509 
00510   return true;
00511 }
00512 
00513 //-----------------------------------EndOfEvent----------------------------------------------
00514 //Will be called by geant4 automatically at the end of each event
00515 void CdcLayerSD::EndOfEvent(G4HCofThisEvent*){
00516   if (verboseLevel>0) {
00517 //    hitsCollection->PrintAllHits();
00518     /*

00520        G4cout << "\n-------->Hits Collection: in this event they are " << NbHits
00521        << " hits in the CDCLAYER chambers: " << G4endl;
00522        for (G4int i=0;i<NbHits;i++) (*hitsCollection)[i]->Print();
00523      */
00524   }
00525 }
